title: Auxiliar De Limpieza Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Texcoco) in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: Hay filtros pero es para mejorar la calidad del trabajo de cada empleado, al principio hay que postularse en el sitio de Internet oficial y hay que hacer evaluaciónes antes de la primera entrevista presencial. Después hay entrevista técnica.

title: Research Associate Interview
Interview Descriptions: The interview was undertaken after we passed the written exam/ STATA test.  The exam contains both the common interview types and competency-based Interview( CBI) e.g. Give an example of a time you handled conflict in the workplace

title: Biometrics Lead Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CIMMYT
Interview Descriptions:
The recruitment process was overseen by an external head hunter company based in the US.
1) Phone meeting with external head hunter 40 min
2) Phone meeting with external head hunter 20 min
3) Emails from external head hunter 
4) Skype slideshow presentation to panel members on my plans for the job (job about  which I received very limited information). 

Lof of pressure from the external recruitment company about how I am supposed to behave during the  skype interview with recruitment panel, and what questions I can ask and not ask. In particular, CIMMYT has very bad reviews as an employer on Glassdoor, they told me not to  confront the panelto this fact. 

The external recruitment company seemed to have only one objective in mind during the whole process: to get someone at the lowest salary and secure their bonus. 
Panel members were dressed like for  going to the beach, slouching on their chair and eating noisily snacks. So unprofessional and disregarding. 
Of note, the line manager for this position did not show up at any point in this 2-month long process. Really weird...
Interview Questions: How would you propose to run a Biometrics unit given the constraints and gaps mentioned in the attached document

title: Post Doctoral Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Texcoco)
Interview Descriptions: Hay un comite compuesto por miembros de otros departamentos asi que es importante conocer bien lo ue se realiza también en otras áreas. Se tiene que preparar una presentación en .ppt por adelantado
Interview Questions:
Cuál es tu visión en 5 años
Qué parte de la investigación de gusta más
Tienes disponibilidad para viajar

title: HR Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Texcoco) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: El proceso de la entrevista fue muy bueno, todos se comportaron de forma muy profesional y me avisaron siempre del paso siguiente dentro del proceso de reclutamiento. Fue intimidante que las ultimas entrevistas fueron hechas en grupo con el Comite Executivo.
Interview Questions:
Preguntas especificas de mis actividades en mi trabajo anterior.
Por que te escogeriamos a ti en lugar de otra persona

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CIMMYT in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: The call med for an online written test after 3 months of applying for the position. The written test last for three hours. The provide some information and I have to develop a project charter.
Interview Questions: Preparing project charter for the information provided

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Nairobi) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview panel (3-4 people) with questions on your communication skills, research skills, experience, conflict management,  driving experience, then and written test which has calculations on seed rate, fertilizer rate, yield calculation, driving test, agronomy, pest and disease identification
Interview Questions: How do you lay out a demonstration plot

title: Coordinador Administrativo Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Texcoco) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: Muy buena, preguntas coherentes, respuestas claras a mis inquietudes y siempre abiertos a  atender mis dudas en cualquire momento. Me citaron con antelación, siempre me atendieron en tiempo y forma y no me hicieron esperar

title: Science Writer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CIMMYT (Nairobi) in Apr 2009
Interview Descriptions: There was an initial flurry of activity and consecutive interviews followed by an almost month-long silence before an offer was made
Interview Questions: How would you handle conflict in the workplace?
